TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Linkify extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Linkify take a piece of text and a regular expression and turns all of the regex matches in the text into clickable links.

Docs.param: Spannable whose text is to be marked-up with links
Mask to define which kinds of links will be searched.
Docs.summary: Scans the text of the provided Spannable and turns all occurrences of the link types indicated in the mask into clickable links.
Docs.returns: True if at least one link is found and applied.

Docs.param: Spannable whose text is to be marked-up with links
Regex pattern to be used for finding links
URL scheme string (eg http://) to be prepended to the links that do not start with this scheme.
Docs.summary: Applies a regex to a Spannable turning the matches into links.
Docs.returns: True if at least one link is found and applied.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Regex pattern to be used for finding links
URL scheme string (eg http://) to be prepended to the links that do not start with this scheme.
Docs.summary: Applies a regex to the text of a TextView turning the matches into links.
Docs.returns: True if at least one link is found and applied.

Docs.param: Url scheme string (eg http:// to be prepended to the url of links that do not have a scheme specified in the link text
The filter that is used to allow the client code additional control over which pattern matches are to be converted into links.
